trans-unit.source: Converts a stream to a <xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContent"></xref> instance.
## XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContentConverter"></xref> class.
Returns whether this converter can convert the specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContent"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 변환기에 지정된 된 개체를 변환할 수 있는지 여부를 반환 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContent"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation returns `true` only for a `sourceType` that is assignable to <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현은 `true` 에 대해서만 `sourceType` 즉 <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream> 에 할당할 수

trans-unit.source: All other `sourceType` types return `false`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you want to convert from.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>이 변환기에서 변환을; 수행할 수 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified stream to a new <xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContent"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 스트림의 새 변환 <xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContent"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The value for `context` must provide services for <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>, <xref:System.Xaml.IRootObjectProvider>, <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory>, and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IProvideValueTarget>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 값 `context` 에 대 한 서비스를 제공 해야 <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>, <xref:System.Xaml.IRootObjectProvider>, <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IProvideValueTarget>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IProvideValueTarget> </xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory> </xref:System.Xaml.IRootObjectProvider> </xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>

trans-unit.source: The schema context when <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider> is queried must be an internally implemented XAML schema context that is particular for BAML usages.
trans-unit.target: 스키마 컨텍스트 때 <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>쿼리 되는 내부적으로 구현 된 XAML 스키마 컨텍스트 BAML 사용에 대 한 특별 하 여야 합니다.</xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>

trans-unit.source: This prevents most user code scenarios from using <xref:System.Windows.DeferrableContentConverter>.
trans-unit.target: 이 대부분의 사용자 코드 시나리오에서 <xref:System.Windows.DeferrableContentConverter>.</xref:System.Windows.DeferrableContentConverter> 를 사용 하 여 방지

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
The source stream to convert.
A new <xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContent"></xref> object.
context is .
context is not able to provide the necessary XAML schema context for BAML.
trans-unit.target: contextBAML에 대 한 필요한 XAML 스키마 컨텍스트를 제공할 수 없는 경우

trans-unit.source: -or- service interpretation of context determines that the target object is not a .
trans-unit.target: -또는- 서비스의 해석 context 으로 결정 대상 개체는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- value is not a valid byte stream.
